get.description: Returns the list of available Marketplace items

parameters.name: includeTenantId
parameters.description: The Id of the Tenant for which to return both the public and private marketplace resources

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Size of the page to be downloaded

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: The Id of the Tenant for which to filter the marketplace resources

parameters.name: types
parameters.description: A comma separated string of marketplace types (e.g.: plugin,template,example,application)

parameters.name: itemUrns
parameters.description: List of item URNs used to fetch only specific items, where the URN pattern is `urn:tenantId:mktp:itemId`. Each list element should be passed on a different query param (ie. itemUrns=urn1&itemUrns=unr2)

parameters.name: resolveResourcesData
parameters.description: If true the returned items contain also the resources data as well as metadata
